item.title: #tidytuesday
item.description: #TidyTuesday! Food pairings for the top 5 varieties, as recommended by reviewers. I don’t like the lines in the plot but couldn’t find anything better. The code is hacky and messy but I learned a ton with this one! code: https://github.com/gkaramanis/tidytuesday/tree/master/week-22 As a bonus, here is a thing I drew many, many years ago.

item.title: Week 1
item.description: Another weekly photo journal, this year it is in black and white.
